alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 28 at 7:20AM CDT until March 28 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Pike County in southern Mississippi... Northeastern Amite County in southern Mississippi... * Until 745 AM CDT. * At 720 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Smithdale, or 8 miles northwest of Mccomb, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Mccomb, Summit and Smithdale. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 18 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
